body.query: FROM test | sort emp_no | eval x1 = concat(ip1, ip2), x2 = coalesce(x1, "255.255.255.255"), x3 = to_ip(x2) | keep emp_no, x*

Only first 20 failures recorded.", 299 Elasticsearch-8.16.2-70a58d5aded9fe84b19607a9af210c87b8e538eb "Line 1:98: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: '127.00.1' is not an IP string literal."
